General.Name: Tabuk Cement Co.
General.Description: Tabuk Cement Company manufactures, trades in, and sells cement and related products for construction industries and infrastructure projects in Saudi Arabia. It offers ordinary Portland cement, sulphate resisting Portland cement, and Portland pozzolan cement, as well as cement derivatives and accessories. The company also engages in the establishment of factories and laboratories for manufacturing cement, including building materials; and import and export of cement and related products. Tabuk Cement Company was founded in 1994 and is based in Tabuk, Saudi Arabia.
